info.name: Enhanced Round KoGaMa with Montserrat
info.description:
To be clear about the changes:
Enhanced - Fixed some issues, added smooth transitions.
Round - Made everything circular.
KoGaMa - It's still KoGaMa, just with a different style.
with Montserrat - The "Montserrat" font is used for text.
info.additionalInfo:
Made by L.R.W.#0340

Please report any issues or give feedback/suggestions.
Released on: 22.03.2023
